title: Cozy Studio Available!
posting_body: Small Animals Allowed (one time deposit and monthly pet rent)
***Units Rent On A First Come First Serve Basis!!
Whichever APPROVED applicant puts the reservation fee on the unit first gets the unit!
This Community has income restrictions you must be below to qualify:
With excellent maintenance and customer service you'll be glad you chose Park Hill and Greentree Apartments as your new home.
We are centrally located near The Landing, the light rail, downtown Renton and Westfield Southcenter.
Park Hill and Greentree Apartment Homes are conveniently located in a quiet wooded neighborhood and feature beautifully landscaped grounds.
A wide variety of spacious floorplans which offers each resident an opportunity to enjoy a truly unique environment.
Select units include free water, sewer & garbage, washer & dryers and fireplaces.
Excellent freeway access and only minutes away from Boeing!
Office is open Monday - Friday 10am - 5pm, By Appointment ONLY; can be reached at
